text: <!channel>: Who wants/is available to represent uncorked at our upcoming events?! Please let me know! :simple_smile:
If the guys have any interested in a non-full-time representative, I'd be game.
I'm down for some schmoozin'
all are welcome!
I'm down
Would people be interested in knowing about awesome design/tech events around town? I tend to stay updated on that sort of thing, and I figure others might enjoy them as well
of course!
Sweet! Would this be the best medium/channel to communicate that info?
in the <#C028ZDVTF> channel
That'd be awesome <@U02HCCTFL>. Thanks!
Cool! I warn you - there are many amazing events here, so if it gets overwhelming let me know and we can create a separate channel
do I have to join <#C028ZDVTF> for these updates now?

<@U0261PCRQ>: If it makes it easier for everyone - I can create a channel for everyone to list outside events happening. Several of them are pretty tech heavy, some design, some civic, and some just drinking
<@U02HCCTFL>: that sounds great
i'd also be into that

name: events_at_uncorked
text: <@U026NB2U2|marcelino> has renamed the channel from "events" to "events_at_uncorked"
we could probably keep a single events channel, no?
for both at uncorked and out in the world?
there are just SO MANY CHANNELS

text: <@U026NB2U2|marcelino> has renamed the channel from "events_at_uncorked" to "events_at_everywhere"
ha
#mondayevents

name: events
text: <@U026NB2U2|marcelino> has renamed the channel from "events_at_everywhere" to "events"
#events_in_se
open to whatever's easiest
we've got the Duke Gen event tomorrow and the Crowdfunding one on Thursday as Stephanie mentioned
#events_in_space
would be cool to have a calendar integration with slack - so that if we added an event to a calendar, <@USLACKBOT> would give us updates here
ooh
then we could just pull in an RSS feed into a calendar (or a couple feeds)
and give a heads up a couple days and a few hours before
#featurerequest
i bet IFTTT already has a google calendar hook
<@U026NB2U2> If you really want to make a request, start with /request or something like that
They're really responsive
theres also this site called Zapier which can hook Google Cal up with Slack
but we should make a dedicated Events Calendar thats different from Team Cal
agree
team cal should be internal only
<@U0261PCRQ> oh nice
